Writer: Robert E. Howard (based on the character created by), Clive Exton, George MacDonald Fraser
Title: Red Sonja
Actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Brigitte Nielsen, Sandahl Bergman, Paul L. Smith
Plot: Seeking revenge, a fiery redheaded female warrior sets out to retrieve a magic orb from an evil queen whose loyal warriors raped her and murdered her entire family. She finds unlikely allies along the way.
